com.emc.vipr.model.sys.logging

Class LogRequestInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.model.sys.logging.LogRequestBase
      • com.emc.vipr.model.sys.logging.LogRequestInfo

  • public class LogRequestInfo
extends LogRequestBase
    Holds the request parameters for a request made to the log service resource.

        Parameters:
        nodeIds - The list of Bourne node ids.
        logNames - The list of log file names.
        severity - The minimum desired severity level.
        startTime - The log start time.
        endTime - The log end time.
        msgRegex - The log message regular expression.
